tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm: Prevents negative status effects when worn. Combine this in a smithing table with any ore, a golden apple, rabbit foot, sugar, blaze powder, or ghast tear in order to produce a positive potion effect when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_regen: Prevents negative status effects and provides Regeneration I when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_jump_: Prevents negative status effects and provides Resistance I when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_speed: Prevents negative status effects and provides Speed I when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_haste: Prevents negative status effects and provides Haste I when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_stren: Prevents negative status effects and provides Strength I when worn.
tooltip.galvoritetech.shimmer_helm_resis: Prevents negative status effects and provides Resistance I when worn.
